body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to DataDrive Solutions. My name is Paul Lopez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Paul, my name is Christine Watson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christine. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. One more piece of information we require is your phone number. Could you tell me your number, one digit at a time?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, three six one, two zero nine eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Christine. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that covers it. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Christine. Thank you for your time. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
